--- DateTime: 2022/2/25 14:21
---@class BattleSceneEntity
local BattleSceneEntity = SimpleClassUtil:class()

function BattleSceneEntity:initialize(battleTeam,entityId)
   self._uid = entityId
   self:initComponent(battleTeam)
end

function BattleSceneEntity:getUid()
    return self._uid
end

---@param battleTeam BattleTeam
function BattleSceneEntity:initComponent(battleTeam)
    self._go_mask = battleTeam._go_roleMask
end

function BattleSceneEntity:getRoleMask()
    return self._go_mask
end

return BattleSceneEntity
